attributes.review: Honestly, worst app I’ve ever used, and I’ve used quite a lot of apps, some of them very bigly, from very, very stable developers. Genius developers. I should know. I fall into both of those categories. Stable genius. That’s me. Bad app. Probably from chINa. Definitely not from Russia. Russia wouldn’t let an app like this out. This isn’t Russia quality.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Not worth it. As soon as it finished downloading, the app kept glitching every time I tried to click on it. It opened to the home page once and then didn’t work after I repeatedly downloaded it. If you’re still into his racist, homophobic, xenophobic, sexist, transphobic opinions, try the internet instead.
attributes.title: Do not get this app

attributes.review:
I am here writing this in order to save tiktok 
tiktok is the one of very few places where teens today can laugh and connect 
therefore if the app is deleted more teens and kids will be depressed and work less hard in school and grades will go down. If trump really wants to make america great again then deleting tiktok will not get him re-elected

i downloaded the app in hopes of gaining trumps attention. (i really want to marry him guys) as soon as i opened the app, it said it would take information out of my phone, and that was even better for me because maybe trump will see my number and call ❤️ anyways, he didn’t, and now i hate him. BERNIE2020

attributes.review: trump is helping ban an amazing app that is my life, I have had this app for 4 years, it has most of my childhood memories, I’ve made so many friends and meet some awesome people. 800 MILLION people are losing huge parts of their lives, I hope you know that you are losing billions of dollars. please don’t ruin a huge part of my life.
attributes.title: banning an amazing app

attributes.review: This app is awful. It spammed me with notifications even though I turned the notifications for this app off. This app is absolutely terrible. I do not recommend it to anyone. I do not even recommend it to people who support Trump. this app is a spam. It will blow your phone up always. 10/10 DO NOT recommend!
attributes.title: Spam

My brain just cannot process it...this app is foul, it put me through so much pain and torture...I suggest that everyone rates it 1 star.

attributes.review: I, Debby Ryan, downloaded this app to see what all of the hype was about. i had read in some of the reviews that it made people make disney history. boy was i wrong!!! it put a virus on my phone that when i tried to google something p*rn would come up! what is this? who would allow this app to be on the appstore!?
attributes.title: so incredibly bad
